text:
Hello,

I have a problem integrating cta with the hubl syntax in my modules.
My button displays correctly but it does not display with the classes defined in HubSpot.
Here is my code to call it :

{% cta "cta" label='Select a CTA', guid='{{module.content_group.cta}}' %}

I spoke with Doug offline about this, and got him set up with the beta functionality in a developer sandbox account. Anyone can feel free to reach out to me if this is something that would interest them <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CBA9UA4EN/p1603745406117600?thread_ts=1603463027.113900&cid=CBA9UA4EN>
